name: SegmentedControl
description: SegmentedControl component for toggling two values or more

props.name: activeColor
props.description: The color of the active segment label

props.name: onChangeIndex
props.description: Callback for when index has change.

props.name: backgroundColor
props.description: The background color of the inactive segments

props.name: activeBackgroundColor
props.description: The background color of the active segment

props.name: outlineColor
props.description: The color of the active segment outline

props.name: outlineWidth
props.description: The width of the active segment outline

props.name: iconOnRight
props.description: Should the icon be on right of the label

props.name: throttleTime
props.description: Trailing throttle time of changing index in ms.

props.name: containerStyle
props.description: Additional spacing styles for the container
